p: Five major search engines, namely MEDLINE, PubMed, EMBASE, and Cochrane Library, were searched for articles published prior to October 2020 that matched any combination of the following key words: [primary dysmenorrhea] OR [dysmenorrhea] OR [menstrual pain] AND [life-style] OR [alternative medicine] OR [complementary medicine] OR [diet] OR [physical activity] OR [herbs] OR [acupressure] OR [acupuncture] OR [aromatherapy] OR [heat therapy] AND [emotional support] AND [psychological support] AND [psychotherapy]. Only scientific papers in English were included. A total of 74 papers were included.
